```{r}
library(tidyverse)
write.table(
	read.delim("exampleData/Class1_exampleData.txt"),
	file = "exampleData/Class1_exampleData.txt",
	row.names = T, col.names = T, append = F, sep = "\t"
)

write.table(
	read.delim("exampleData/TimeSeries_example.csv"),
	file = "exampleData/TimeSeries_example.csv",
	row.names = T, col.names = T, append = F, sep = ","
)

readLines("exampleData/script_class1f.R") %>% 
	writeLines("exampleData/script_class1f.R", sep = "\n")

readLines("exampleData/script_class1t.R") %>% 
	writeLines("exampleData/script_class1t.R", sep = "\n")

readLines("exampleData/script_class2t.R") %>% 
	writeLines("exampleData/script_class2t.R", sep = "\n")
```
